channel.title: Cowhide Collector
channel.description:
I need a cowhide collector that will pick up cowhides from the cow farm in lumbridge then bank all the cowhides that it picks up and returns to the cow farm, i need it to keep doing this continuously (Don't know how to spell, sorry). Also need anti randoms too (Which uses SRL).
Thanks to whoever creates the best script, Dudeofthed.

item.title: Cowhide Collector
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

[quote=“dudeofthed, post:14, topic:59011”][quote author=junkj link=topic=84529.msg925417#msg925417 date=1172081150]

There could be by using mini-map symbols from the srl manual.

ok, can you just do it any way you want as long as it works.

Yeah but you have to wait im taking on like 3 script request right now,sorry.
[/quote]

ahh, it’s ok. I understand.[br][size=1]Posted on: 21-02-2007, 23:21:02[/size][hr]Anyways, how’s the Cowhide Collector coming along? Or are you still working on the other requests.[/quote]

Ill see what i can do.

item.title: Cowhide Collector
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

function RadialRoadWalk(TheColor: Integer; StartRadial, EndRadial: Integer; Radius: Integer; Xmod, Ymod: Integer): Boolean;
By: WT-Fakawi & Wizzup?
Description:
Walks TheColor from StartRadial to EndRadial for Radius Distance
Valid Arguments:
TheColor:= RoadColor. RoadColor will be dynamically updated.
StartRadial/EndRadial := Any number between 0-1440. 0=N,90=E,180=S,270=W. DO NOT USE NUMBERS UNDER 0 or ABOVE 1440
Radius:= Distance from the centre of minimap, i.e. how far away the mouse clicks. Use numbers 20-72
XMod, YMod := deviation from MouseFindFlag. -2 to 2.

Read full topic
